item.description: TeamCity 2024.12 introduces a redesigned UI, conditional build chains, simplified OAuth token management, and enhanced AWS and Perforce integrations.Â New features also include support for custom Kotlin DSL libraries, centralized refreshable token management, and single-action build chain approvals, among others.
